title: Objectives in urf need to be MASSIVELY tuned down
body:
Rift herald + baron?
Elder dragon giving 5 dragons and a load of exp?
More turret platings plus each one is worth THREE HUNDRED GOLD??! 
Not to mention both Baron and Elder dragon GIVE SO MUCH DAMN EXP that you also OUTRIGHT OUTLEVEL THE ENEMY TEAM. 

You didn’t “rebalance the gamemode.” You’re just trying to kill it off for good as this will easily lead to more burnout than ever.


I’m not even upset about the whole thing it’s just... it feels like the game is all about who gets first elder, snowballs out of control, and ends. I like my urf games fast but at this point it’s not even really urf anymore, just elder dragon turret plating summoners rift on steroids.

replies.body: I would go so far as to say just get rid of ALL objectives for urf. No turret plating, no baron, no elder.
I agree we dont need that

> [{quoted}](name=Pierce The Veal,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GUFieiKZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-29T10:20:08.433+0000)
>
> You didn’t “rebalance the gamemode.” You’re just trying to kill it off for good as this will easily lead to more burnout than ever.

i starting to suspect that was the goal...

The elder dragon is nonsense, the turret plating giving that much gold when in original urf there wasn’t even first turret gold implemented yet is nonsense, and of them all, the least nonsense one, baron, is still dumb because of the stats, exp, gold, rift herald, and pushing benefits. 

None of these objectives are really objectives at all. They’re simply too easy to take and lead to ridiculous leads between teams. The slightly ahead team taking elder at level 8 and now being 5 level 11’s with elder vs 5 level 8’s is absolute nonsense. It’s instantly gg there. If you’re good at killing turrets? Each turret is now a free item or more. 

Back in the day during classic urf there was no first tower gold, no turret plating, no elder dragon, no baron giving massive pushing benefits.
urf is prototyping new patches for the next season
They gave people exactly what they asked for: original urf. Now you have it. This is what that is.
elder drake buff was never in original urf moron, neither was herald + baron

Pretty much. The casual one and done URF players wanted normal URF over ARURF. Now we get 10 days of the same bans, same picks, and mirror matches. Nothing spells fun like back to back games with Zed, Shaco, and Yuumi vs Zed, Shaco, and Yuumi. The objectives are over the top, but they're extremely exacerbated on a team of 3-5 S tier URF champions.

The last ARURF lasted 3 weeks, and I couldn't stop playing it. Two days of this shit and I'm already back to playing other games. Riot should give us a week of ARURF when URF ends.
all of those things were not in the original urf

community ask for classic urf 
THE CLASSIC RIOT{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Yeah.  I played 1 game of it just now, don't think ill be playing another.
its called Ultra rapid fire for a reason bro.
Yes: the reason is because you can cast abilities ultra rapidly--not because the game is supposed to end in 5 minutes.
They're supposed to be fast paced games. And you'll only get burnt out if you let yourself.
